name: Zombies Are Coming! TD
description:
ZOMBIES ARE COMING TD! Is a 3d tower defense game where its your job to control the nation's army to stop the zombie hordes across various locations from graveyard and campsite to high up in the mountain's, can you survive the onslaught??

this is my first ever game and it has been a lot of fun making it,

Right now im working on more levels, more tower types and more zombies. aswell as a lot more feautres so expect a lot of updates and improvements in the coming weeks.

controls:

usual point and click tower selction and placement system.

W,A,S,D moves the camera and ScrollWheel zooms it in and out.

#rpg #other #shooter #strategy #action #arcade #retro #survival #pointnclick #puzzle #adventure
